Package net.beadsproject.beads.analysis.featureextractors

Provides a set of analysis classes for analysing a stream of audio frames.

Package net.beadsproject.beads.analysis.featureextractors Description

Provides a set of analysis classes for analysing a stream of audio frames. These are generally instances of FrameFeatureExtractor or PowerSpectrumListener.
